ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: I learned a ton about my chosen topic (NFTs, their technical implementations, and their economic implications).
I learned research techniques and insight in order to write my final report

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments:
Strengths: learn independent research and learn a lot about one subject/project, I loved my advisor!!!

Weaknesses: there are very very few guidelines online, absolutely no reminders, assistance, or reaching out from the department which leaves many gigantic questions as to how a senior project actually works and very little help.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: Yes! Obviously this is a senior project so its rather required, but my advisor (Professor Feigenbaum) gave me the freedom to read/explore what I wanted and always added new insights to whatever article or topic I brought up with her.

haha its not an option, but no I would not recommend, writing a thesis is kinda hellish especially if you have procrastination issues since there are zero deadlines until the end. The course should be much more organized by the DUS/department, because right now they don't do a single thing and it makes the entire experience seem much more daunting, confusing, and intimidating. Even just reaching out to all the seniors at the beginning of the year mentioning that this is coming and how/when to find an advisor would have been more helpful. I also would have appreciated a couple more deadlines to keep me more on track. An outline deadline and maybe a draft could have been helpful to me. Zero communication whatsoever is kind of ridiculous.
